text: AAX is an institutional-grade platform enabling people to access a protected
and trustworthy market by leveraging a technology from a regulated market.
Inspired by professional trading interface
Cyber Security Control ISO 27001 International Standart
World Class Technology Solution for the Growing and Innovating Blockchain Industry, Proven by 40 Regulated Markets

name.title: Paul Jackson
text: Leader of Asia-Pacific cybersecurity and investigations practice.
tooltip: Arrived as a member of the Hong Kong Police Force in 1988. With an engineering background, Paul moved into the technology Policing area in the mid-90s when the mobile telecommunications market first opened up. Since then he has pio- neered cyber-investigations and digital forensics ca- pabilities within the HK Police, and subsequently with Interpol and JPMorgan.

experience, we reflect the integrity, security and
